content: our existing models, so we can now enable our IT developers to use generative AI and enhance their productivity by X%. Chapter 4. Onboarding a new foundation model 51  The new model has been tuned to handle the Dutch language better than our existing models, so we can now enable a conversational assistant for our Dutch customers and improve first-time resolution by Y%. 4.4.3 Build or buy Instead of creating a solution ourselves with a new foundation model, can we buy tooling that already does that? As more applications become AI-enabled, the benefits of buy rather than build could be:  Achieve the projected benefits faster with a turn-key application.  Enhanced functionality from a specialist vendor compared to what we could deliver in a first stage ourselves.  Focus scarce internal AI resources on the most strategic AI projects. 4.4.4 Exit strategy The speed of innovation in AI is very high, how easily can we change course if something better comes along? Consider aspects such
